# Run project (for users)

```console
$ sudo apt install poetry
$ poetry install
$ poetry run python .
```

# Run project (for devs)

```console
$ sudo apt install poetry
$ poetry config virtualenvs.in-project true
$ poetry install
$ poetry run pre-commit install
$ poetry run python .
```

# Demo

From the `xorpd`'s `xchg rax,rax` [snippet 0x09](https://www.xorpd.net/pages/xchg_rax/snip_09.html):

```console
$ poetry run python .
Commands
 .q:         Quit this program
 .quit:      Quit this program

> mov rax, 4
CODE:
0000000000000004: 48 c7 c0 04 00 00 00             | mov rax, 4
REGISTERS:
rax:    0000000000000004  r8:  0000000000000000  cs: 0000000000000000
rbx:    0000000000000000  r9:  0000000000000000  ss: 0000000000000000
rcx:    0000000000000000  r10: 0000000000000000  ds: 0000000000000000
rdx:    0000000000000000  r11: 0000000000000000  es: 0000000000000000
rdi:    0000000000000000  r12: 0000000000000000  fs: 0000000000000000
rsi:    0000000000000000  r13: 0000000000000000  gs: 0000000000000000
rbp:    0000000000000000  r14: 0000000000000000
rsp:    0000000000200000  r15: 0000000000000000
rip:    0000000000000007
eflags: 0000000000000006 [ PF ]
STACK:
0000000000200000: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200010: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200020: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200030: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
> shr rax, 3
CODE:
0000000000000007: 48 c1 e8 03                      | shr rax, 3
REGISTERS:
rax:    0000000000000000  r8:  0000000000000000  cs: 0000000000000000
rbx:    0000000000000000  r9:  0000000000000000  ss: 0000000000000000
rcx:    0000000000000000  r10: 0000000000000000  ds: 0000000000000000
rdx:    0000000000000000  r11: 0000000000000000  es: 0000000000000000
rdi:    0000000000000000  r12: 0000000000000000  fs: 0000000000000000
rsi:    0000000000000000  r13: 0000000000000000  gs: 0000000000000000
rbp:    0000000000000000  r14: 0000000000000000
rsp:    0000000000200000  r15: 0000000000000000
rip:    0000000000000004
eflags: 0000000000000047 [ CF PF ZF ]
STACK:
0000000000200000: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200010: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200020: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200030: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
> adc rax, 0
CODE:
0000000000000004: 48 83 d0 00                      | adc rax, 0
REGISTERS:
rax:    0000000000000001  r8:  0000000000000000  cs: 0000000000000000
rbx:    0000000000000000  r9:  0000000000000000  ss: 0000000000000000
rcx:    0000000000000000  r10: 0000000000000000  ds: 0000000000000000
rdx:    0000000000000000  r11: 0000000000000000  es: 0000000000000000
rdi:    0000000000000000  r12: 0000000000000000  fs: 0000000000000000
rsi:    0000000000000000  r13: 0000000000000000  gs: 0000000000000000
rbp:    0000000000000000  r14: 0000000000000000
rsp:    0000000000200000  r15: 0000000000000000
rip:    0000000000000004
eflags: 0000000000000002 [  ]
STACK:
0000000000200000: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200010: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200020: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200030: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
> .quit
```

From the `xorpd`'s `xchg rax,rax` [snippet 0x1c](https://www.xorpd.net/pages/xchg_rax/snip_1c.html):

```console
$ poetry run python .
Commands
 .q:         Quit this program
 .quit:      Quit this program

> nop
CODE:
0000000000000000: 90                               | nop
REGISTERS:
rax:    0000000000000000  r8:  0000000000000000  cs: 0000000000000000
rbx:    0000000000000000  r9:  0000000000000000  ss: 0000000000000000
rcx:    0000000000000000  r10: 0000000000000000  ds: 0000000000000000
rdx:    0000000000000000  r11: 0000000000000000  es: 0000000000000000
rdi:    0000000000000000  r12: 0000000000000000  fs: 0000000000000000
rsi:    0000000000000000  r13: 0000000000000000  gs: 0000000000000000
rbp:    0000000000000000  r14: 0000000000000000
rsp:    0000000000200000  r15: 0000000000000000
rip:    0000000000000001
eflags: 0000000000000002 [  ]
STACK:
0000000000200000: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200010: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200020: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000200030: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
> pop rsp
CODE:
0000000000000001: 5c                               | pop rsp
REGISTERS:
rax:    0000000000000000  r8:  0000000000000000  cs: 0000000000000000
rbx:    0000000000000000  r9:  0000000000000000  ss: 0000000000000000
rcx:    0000000000000000  r10: 0000000000000000  ds: 0000000000000000
rdx:    0000000000000000  r11: 0000000000000000  es: 0000000000000000
rdi:    0000000000000000  r12: 0000000000000000  fs: 0000000000000000
rsi:    0000000000000000  r13: 0000000000000000  gs: 0000000000000000
rbp:    0000000000000000  r14: 0000000000000000
rsp:    0000000000000000  r15: 0000000000000000
rip:    0000000000000001
eflags: 0000000000000002 [  ]
STACK:
0000000000000000: 5c 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000000010: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000000020: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
0000000000000030: 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 |................|
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
> .quit
```
